# iosxr_yang (Data Source)

This data source can retrieve one or more attributes via gNMI.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `path` (String) A gNMI path, e.g. `openconfig-interfaces:/interfaces/interface`.

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `attributes` (Map of String) Map of key-value pairs which represents the attributes and its values.
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `lists` (Attributes List) List of lists with items. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--lists))

<a id="nestedatt--lists"></a>
### Nested Schema for `lists`

Read-Only:

- `items` (List of Map of String) List items.
- `key` (String) List key attribute name.
- `name` (String) List name.
- `values` (List of String) List values.
